title: Digitalamiro — Premium Strategic Web Development Studio Website

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive visual design system across the entire site: black (#0A0A0A), white (#FFFFFF), and charcoal (#1C1C1E) as the primary palette with a single subtle warm-gray or amber accent (#C9A96E or similar). Use a strong typographic hierarchy with a large-weight serif or geometric sans-serif display font for headings (e.g., 64–80px bold), clean body text, generous white space, consistent 8px-based spacing grid, and alternating dark/light contrast sections. All interactive elements (buttons, accordion toggles) should have smooth CSS transitions. Apply smooth scroll behavior globally.

quotes: Premium feel (similar to Stripe, Linear, or Apple style)
Black, white, charcoal with subtle accent color

acceptanceCriteria: Color palette is limited to black, white, charcoal, and one accent color — no vivid gradients
Heading font size is visually dominant (64px+ on desktop)
All sections alternate between dark and light backgrounds consistently
Buttons have visible hover animation (scale or background transition)
Smooth scroll is active site-wide

requirements.text: Build a sticky top navbar that remains fixed on scroll. Include the Digitalamiro wordmark/logo on the left, navigation links (Home, Services, Work, Process, About, Insights, Contact) in the center, and a primary CTA button 'Book a Strategy Call →' on the right. The navbar should have a subtle backdrop blur and border-bottom on scroll to stay readable against both dark and light sections.

quotes: Home | Services | Work | Process | About | Insights | Contact

acceptanceCriteria: Navbar stays fixed at top during scroll
All 7 nav links are present and scroll to their respective sections
'Book a Strategy Call →' button is visible and styled as primary CTA
Navbar becomes visually distinct (backdrop blur / border) when scrolled past hero

requirements.text: Build the Hero section as a two-column layout: left column contains a small label span 'Premium Web Development Studio', a large bold headline 'Custom Websites Built To Elevate Your Brand — And Convert.', two short paragraph sentences, five bullet points (✔ Fully custom website design tailored to your brand — never template-based; ✔ Conversion-focused UX structured to drive clear action; ✔ Fast, scalable, mobile-first development optimized for performance; ✔ SEO-ready foundation built for long-term visibility; ✔ Designed to support marketing and future scaling), a primary CTA 'Book a Strategy Call →' and a secondary CTA 'View Our Work →'. Right column renders the generated website mockup image (hero-mockup.dim_900x640.png) from frontend/public/assets/generated.

quotes: Hero section (left content, right website mockup)
Custom Websites Built To Elevate Your Brand — And Convert.

Display three equal-width cards/columns: (1) 'Custom Web Design & Development' — subheadline 'Engineered For Conversion And Authority', description, 6 bullet points, CTA 'Explore Web Development →'; (2) 'Performance-Ready Websites' — subheadline 'Built To Support Paid Traffic And Marketing', description, 5 bullet points, CTA 'Discuss Your Project →'; (3) 'eCommerce Development' — subheadline 'Online Stores Designed To Sell', description, 5 bullet points, CTA 'Build Your Store →'. Each card has a subtle border and hover lift effect.

Each step shows a step number, bold title, and one-sentence description. Use a connecting line or progress indicator between steps.
